text: The crazy butterfly rolled up next to the rose, with so little skin that it stuck itself in the spine and there it was dead, with its beautifully flaccid, blue-green wings falling on the leaves. - What flower are you? - asked surprised and jealous the rose queen of the garden. "I am the true flower of love", replied the proud thorny. And without knowing it, he was telling the truth. The Commission shall adopt implementing acts in accordance with Article 21 of this Regulation.
title: La flor del amor
author: nan Salarrué
